text: Edward Nipake Natapei Tuta Fanua`araki (17 July 1954 â€“ 27 July 2015) was a politician from Vanuatu. He was elected Prime Minister of Vanuatu on two separate terms, and was previously the Minister of Foreign Affairs briefly in 1991, the acting President of Vanuatu from 2 March 1999 to 24 March 1999 (during a time in which he was the Speaker of Parliament), and Deputy Prime Minister. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from disease Category:Government ministers Category:Presidents of Vanuatu Category:Prime ministers of Vanuatu
title: Edward Natapei
